channel.title: ProIonic 728 brand new NEED STAFF
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i769.photobucket.com/albums/xx332/tonyg2pro/banner.png[/img]
Website: [URL=http://proionic.forumotion.ca]Click Here.[/URL] Webclient:[URL=http://proionic.forumotion.ca/h2-webclient]Click Here.[/URL] Downloadable Client: [URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/d5axss4e6a2u1b5/ProIonic.jar?dl=1]Click Here.[/URL]
ProIonic is an epic pvp and also skill based server with an economy, & a great community! we are now open from beta and welcome you to join the astonishing server ProIonic728.
Updates Full dungeoneering All skills working Added squeal of fortune 100% Small glitches fixed MORE TO COME!
Features ------------ - Working NEX - DICING - Barrows - Jad - DominionTower - Corp Beast with dark core! - Online 24/7 with efficient updates - 100% Uptime - No lag - Money pouch - 100% trading - Queen Black Dragon - 63 wave Fight Caves - 100% Fight Pits Minigame - WORKING SUMMONING-** - WORKING CONSTRUCTION-** - 100%WORKING SKILLS-** - Dominion Tower with rewards - Corporeal Beast - XP lamps - Perfect switching - Fully working curses,ancients,lunar and gfx. - quick and fun leveling - Economy - News announcements - boss kills, levels, and more! - Hours of fun - Dedicated staff team and developers that provide great player support - Active forums 24/7 - dicing - Summoning with working scrolls - Donator pets - epic pvp and pvm - Fully working MiniGames - Korasi and other weapons with proper special attack - dungeoneering floor with working boss! - Loads of shops - Working Skills -------------------------------- Disclaimer: As this is beta there still will be a lot of work that needs to be done and bugs that need to be fixed, so if you do find a bug please report it other wise don't abuse them thx :)

item.title: ProIonic 728 brand new NEED STAFF

item.description:
@aussie123 wrote:

Website: Click Here.
Webclient:Click Here.
Downloadable Client: Click Here.

ProIonic is an epic pvp and also skill based server with an economy, & a great community!
we are now open from beta and welcome you to join the astonishing server ProIonic728.

Updates
Full dungeoneering
All skills working
Added squeal of fortune 100%
Small glitches fixed
MORE TO COME!

Features

  • Working NEX

  • 63 wave Fight Caves

  • quick and fun leveling

As this is beta there still will be a lot of work that needs to be done
and bugs that need to be fixed, so if you do find a bug please report it other wise don’t abuse them thx
